title:
Caputo fractional stochastic differential equations: Lipschitz
  continuity in the fractional order
authors: T.C. Son, N.T. Dung, P.T.P Thuy, T.M. Cuong, H.T.P. Thao, P.D. Tung
abstract:
In this paper, we consider a class of the Caputo fractional stochastic
differential equations of fractional order $\alpha \in (\frac{1}{2},1]$. Our
aim is to provide a complete analysis of the continuous dependence of solutions
on the fractional order $\alpha.$ We first provide optimal estimates for the
strong and weak distances between two solutions with different fractional
orders. We then describe the exact asymptotic behavior of these distances.
